DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response rate duration response mitomycin , vinorelbine , cisplatin plus tretinoin patient stage IIIB IV non-small cell lung cancer . - Determine toxicity treatment regimen patient . - Determine survival patient treatment regimen . OUTLINE : Patients receive tretinoin orally twice daily 4 day start day 1 8 ; cisplatin IV 2 hour vinorelbine IV day 1 8 ; mitomycin IV ( course 1 3 ) day 1 . Treatment repeat every 3 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow survival . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : At total 15-46 patient accrue study .
